duties_responsibilities.duty: Serve as a subject expert in presenting, promoting, and marketing Medicare products to individuals, groups, and community organizations
Cultivate and maintain collaborative relationships with contracted providers and primary care site partners

Conduct enrollment-related activities, including identifying potential prospects, screening leads, setting appointments, explaining the program, completing enrollment applications, and submitting enrollments
Develop a resource map of the assigned territory, including community-based organizations, elder service agencies, elderly and disabled housing, food pantries, and churches
Plan and implement a monthly action plan for the territory, consistently meeting or exceeding enrollment and outreach targets
Attend and assist with planning educational, outreach, and health-related events
Coordinate and interact with various roles within the organization and its partners to ensure prompt handling of customer requests, questions, and issues
Ensure compliance and adherence to Medicare and Medicaid enrollment and marketing policies and procedures
Provide recommendations and suggestions for improvements in office operations, enrollments, and marketing practices

education_certification.credential: Michigan Individual Health Insurance Producer License
